dialogueacts.text: Um and there's two main trends in th in the sort of design practice .

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: On the one hand <disfmarker> and this uh this particularly relates to its sort of earliest models where with you know i so so many buttons on it

dialogueacts.speaker: A
dialogueacts.text: And on the other hand there's a user focused approach

dialogueacts.text: that pares things down to just what <vocalsound> what is most likely to get used . Um <vocalsound>
dialogueacts.label: inf
